    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³     Making music should be as easy as powering up a computer, loading up a          Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ powerful piece of music software, and getting down to business. And it is. Reason   Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ 3.0 is a virtual studio rack with all the tools and instruments you need to turn    Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ your ideas into music. And it&#039;s more than just a set of excellent synths and        Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ effects. It&#039;s a complete music system. Step into the age of Reason.                 Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³                                                                                     Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³     As a Reason user, you can forget about the downsides of music production.       Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ Forget malfunctioning modules and confusing connections. Reason&#039;s cablesdon&#039;t       Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ tangle. Forget about tiny backlit displays and steep learning curves. Reason is so  Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ direct you&#039;ll learn it in minutes. And forget the tedious process of gathering all  Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ the different disks and sound banks needed to load up a song. With Reason, picking  Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ up where you left off ??? be it last night or last month ??? is as simple as        Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ turning the power on. When you save your music, your whole studio setup is stored   Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ along with it. You can even include your samples, loops and drum kits in the        Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ Reason file, for easy web publishing or email collaboration with other Reason       Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ users. For once, total recall is truly total.                                       Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³                                                                                     Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³     And so is the sound. The audio quality is everything you would expect from      Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ Propellerhead Software. But pristine sound quality is only half the story; the      Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ instruments and effects in Reason are loaded with character and attitude. Although  Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ easy to learn and a breeze to use, Reason is an extremely flexible system that&#039;s    Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ as complex and advanced as you make it. And with sophisticated tools such as the    Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ MClass mastering suite, or the Combinator, which lets you build new instruments     Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ and effects by combining and layering Reason devices, Reason will not just          Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
    Ã‚Â²Ã‚Â³ impress, but inspire you.                                                           Ã‚Â³Ã‚Â±
